title: Skins are personalization, NOT achievement awards. (stop the "Refund ur skin" comments)
body:
Getting so sick of hearing this every single game. 
If I have a bad game, sooner or later I will hear this line (and the one saying it often thinks they are soooo clever)
"OMG U suck so bad, Refund ur skin!"
It seems to always happen, you can have a bad game and regardless of the reason people will tell you to refund your skin. 
Get it straight, 
Skins are in the store as CUSTOMIZATION/PERSONALIZATION
They are -NOT- achievements. Buying a skin does not come with the magical condition that you must get a quadra/penta every game or your skin will instantly disappear. Skins are there to add a personal touch, they are a way of showing off a bit of who you are through the champ you use. 
They do not require you to complete some skill challenge or get 3 pentas without dying in order to purchase them. 
Maybe if you ask riot nicely, they will develop a special skin that comes with a free pair of USB hands to help you hold your nose in the air. 
Maybe some day they will come out with special skins that are unlocked with achievements, But for the rest of the skins, 
They are in the shop for a reason, TO BE SOLD. 
If I find a skin I like, I will buy it, I will wear it and I dont have to complete your 28/0 uber-pro, get-a-penta-5-times condition to use it. 
So once again, Knock it off with the "REFUND THAT SKIN, U dont deserve it" remarks.
They are really old, really boring, and only make you look like a self-entitled "better than thou" *quack*hole than someone trying to make a witty remark.
